children.text: There are gaps around the garage roller door, which will allow embers to enter in the event of a bushfire.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3959 Construction of Buildings in Bushfire-Prone Areas, states that ‘
Roller doors shall have guide tracks with a maximum gap no greater than 3 mm and shall be fitted with a nylon brush that is in contact with the door’ .
The present installation of this door and the weather strips must be rectified to comply with these requirements.
